channel.title: Comments on: Ratatouille
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: Drey
item.dc:creator: Drey
item.description: I thought Cloverfield was entertaining and effective. It definitely delivered on the hype.
item.content:encoded: I thought Cloverfield was entertaining and effective. It definitely delivered on the hype.

item.title: By: ljedi
item.dc:creator: ljedi
item.description: What did you think of Cloverfield? I've wanted to see that ever since I first saw the Statue of Liberty's freaking HEAD skid down the road...
item.content:encoded: What did you think of Cloverfield? I’ve wanted to see that ever since I first saw the Statue of Liberty’s freaking HEAD skid down the road…
